title: 10 things we learned about tackling plastic ocean waste
body: Here is what the experts said in an online debate on plastic pollution. Hannah Gould. @hannahbgould. Tue 23 Jun 2015 08.57 EDT Last modified on Fri 29 Oct 2021 07.53 EDT. 1. We can't keep up ...
readable_content:
The Guardian (2023-12-08): 

- In a live online debate, experts discussed various aspects of plastic pollution in oceans. Some key points include the challenges in waste management, the need for government and business actions, the economic implications, the role of designers and recyclers, global and local solutions to the problem, and the need for a collective effort to remove plastic products from the market. The article also emphasizes the importance of supporting independent journalism by providing a reader-supported model to ensure independence and accessibility for everyone.
summary:
The information provided emphasizes the importance of addressing plastic pollution in oceans through various perspectives, including waste management, government and business actions, economic implications, and collective efforts. It also highlights the need for supporting independent journalism. Overall, the sentiment seems to be supportive of taking action to address plastic pollution.
